summary: Header “Gold Paper” nav item was changed to an internal SPA route (`/gold-paper`). The `/gold-paper` page now renders the required placeholder text and does not show any redirect logic in the provided diff. Two project metadata/summary files were also modified with unrelated content.

missing_requirements.requirement: The `/gold-paper` page must display ONLY the following single line of text (exactly): “Golden Paper temporarily unavailable – content preserved”. No additional UI elements are shown on `/gold-paper`.
missing_requirements.reason:
The updated page includes additional layout/styling wrappers (`div` containers and a styled `

`), so based strictly on the diff it is not demonstrably “ONLY the single line of text” with no other UI elements.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove (or leave unused) any Gold Paper button/link implementation that routes users to the documentation canister root, ensuring there is no remaining user path from the header Gold Paper entry point(s) to `https://whu4t-kiaaa-aaaah-qsc5q-cai.icp0.io/`.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows the header link now points to `/gold-paper`, but it does not provide evidence that *all* other potential Gold Paper entry points or leftover external links/redirect code (outside Header.tsx) were removed or left unused.

hallucinated_features.description: Unrequested updates to repository summary/metadata files describing many unrelated features (e.g., query synchronization, monster distribution system, OpenStreetMap/Leaflet details, AR mode behavior, SEO metadata, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is narrowly scoped to changing the Gold Paper nav link and replacing the `/gold-paper` page with a placeholder. Modifying these summary/metadata files is not requested and includes descriptions unrelated to Gold Paper behavior.
